attributes.action: Allow drivers to turn left on a red traffic signal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just like in the states, the rule here in the United Kingdom would allow drivers to stop and yeild on a red traffic signal and continue if the way is clear and safe to do so. This keeping traffic running smoothly without delays or back-ups.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
